name: BiodivSourcing
headAddress: Suite D 6/F Ho Lee Comm Building
membership: Affilliate member of the Union for Ethical BioTrade (UEBT): www.ethicalbiotrade.org
goal:
BiodivSourcing aims to support companies working with Natural Ressources to use buoduversity sustainably, help towrds a better future.

We support companies in integrating biodiversity issues in their sourcing practices.
We support companies to better understand the implementation of the Nagoya Protocol when looking at their innovations derived from biodiversity use.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
ABS Consultation forum
EU 511/3014
EU 1855-2015
Horizontal guidance
Sectorial guidances on the implementation of the EU 511/2014
customers: Cosmo International Ingredients,CRODAROM,Royal DSM, Nutritional Product,ISEAL Alliance,Laboratoires CLARINS,Laboratoires Prod'Hyg et LETICC,SEDERMA,Societe Albert Vieille
